medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 day prior to admission. The pain started as dull and later became sharp. Associated symptoms include nausea and multiple episodes of non-bloody/bilious emesis. The patient reports anorexia and has had no bowel movements since before the onset of pain.
medical_history.family_history: Hypertension (HTN), hyperlipidemia (HLD), glaucoma, no history of cancer.
